item.title: Noah Wyle Wears Tuxedo Made by Scrubs Brand to Emmys
item.description: The best drama actor winner for ‘The Pitt’ sported a custom navy suit created by health care apparel company FIGS.

item.title: ‘The Pitt’ Boss R. Scott Gemmill Dedicates Emmys Best Drama Win to “Healthcare Workers and Frontline First Responders”
item.description: “Respect them, protect them, trust them,” the showrunner said on stage at the 2025 show.

item.title: Noah Wyle Dedicates ‘The Pitt’ Emmy Win to Healthcare Workers
item.description: The actor, who was last nominated for his role on ‘ER,’ took home the lead actor in drama series win at the 2025 Emmys.

item.title: HBO Max Shares First Footage From ‘The Pitt’ Season 2: “And So It Begins”
item.description: The teaser for the upcoming, in-production episodes, premiering in January, confirms the return of Katherine LaNasa’s charge nurse Dana and Patrick Ball’s Dr. Langdon.

item.title: HBO Max Shares First Footage From ‘The Pitt’ Season 2: “And So It Begins”
item.description: The teaser for the upcoming, in-production episodes, premiering in January, confirms the return of Katherine LaNasa’s charge nurse Dana and Patrick Ball’s Dr. Langdon.

item.title: R. Scott Gemmill Had a Very Different Idea for a Medical Drama Before ‘The Pitt’ – One That Involved Flashbacks to ‘ER’
item.description: “I knew I would have access to the original footage of ER so I could do scenes with Noah as Dr. John Carter and flash back to him as John Carter as a med student,” the creator tells THR.

item.title: R. Scott Gemmill Had a Very Different Idea for a Medical Drama Before ‘The Pitt’ – One That Involved Flashbacks to ‘ER’
item.description: “I knew I would have access to the original footage of ER so I could do scenes with Noah as Dr. John Carter and flash back to him as John Carter as a med student,” the creator tells THR.
